$:/xp/LeftOpenTab/button.title: $:/xp/LeftOpenTab/button
$:/xp/LeftOpenTab/button.caption: {{$:/xp/images/leftopentab}} left open tab
$:/xp/LeftOpenTab/button.text: \whitespace trim \import $:/xp/LeftOpenTab/macros <$reveal state="$:/state/leftopentab" default="no" retain="yes"/> <$list filter="[[$:/xp/LeftOpenTab/judge]!is[tiddler]]" variable="ignore"> <$button set="$:/state/leftopentab" setTo="yes" tooltip="Left open tab" aria-label="Left open tab" class=<>> <$list filter="[prefix[yes]]"> {{$:/xp/images/leftopentab}} <$list filter="[prefix[yes]]"> <$text text="left open tab"/> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/xp/LeftOpenTab/compatible-with-Stories-plugin.css" tags="$:/tags/Stylesheet"/> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/core/ui/SideBar/Open" tags=""/> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/state/tab/sidebar--595412856" text="TableOfContents"/> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/xp/LeftOpenTab/judge" text="pass"/> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/storyleft" text=<>/> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/storyright" text=<>/> <$list filter="[[$:/xp/LeftOpenTab/judge]is[tiddler]]" variable="ignore"> <$button set="$:/state/leftopentab" setTo="no" tooltip="Restore open tab" aria-label="Restore open tab" class=<>> <$list filter="[prefix[yes]]"> {{$:/xp/images/restoreopentab}} <$list filter="[prefix[yes]]"> <$text text="restore open tab"/> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/xp/LeftOpenTab/compatible-with-Stories-plugin.css" tags=""/> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/core/ui/SideBar/Open" tags="$:/tags/SideBar"/> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/state/tab/sidebar--595412856" text="$:/core/ui/SideBar/Open"/> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/storyleft" text=<>/> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/storyright" text=<>/> <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler="$:/xp/LeftOpenTab/judge"/>

$:/xp/LeftOpenTab/compatible-with-Storie.title: $:/xp/LeftOpenTab/compatible-with-Stories-plugin.css

$:/xp/LeftOpenTab/content.title: $:/xp/LeftOpenTab/content
$:/xp/LeftOpenTab/content.text:
\whitespace trim \import $:/xp/LeftOpenTab/macros/title \define lingo-base() $:/language/CloseAll/ \define drop-actions() <$action-listops $tiddler=<> $subfilter="+[insertbefore:currentTiddler]"/> <$action-listops $tiddler=<<_otherStory>> $subfilter="-[]"/> \end \define placeholder()
\end \define droppable-item(button) \whitespace trim <$droppable actions=<>> <>
$button$
\end \define open-tiddler-list()
addsuffix[-primaryList]] -[[$:/temp/advancedsearch/selected-item]get[text]] +[then[]else[tc-list-item-selected]] }}}> <$list filter="[list]" history=<> storyview="pop">
<$macrocall $name="droppable-item" button="""<$button message="tm-close-tiddler" tooltip={{$:/language/Buttons/Close/Hint}} aria-label={{$:/language/Buttons/Close/Caption}} class="tc-btn-invisible tc-btn-mini">{{$:/core/images/close-button}} <>"""/>
<$tiddler tiddler=""> <$macrocall $name="droppable-item" button="""<$button message="tm-close-all-tiddlers" class="tc-btn-invisible tc-btn-mini" style="padding:3px 0 0 0;margin-left:0.6em;"><>"""/>
\end
{{$:/language/SideBar/Open/Caption}}   {{$:/xp/LeftOpenTab/button}}
<$set name="_otherStory" filter="[enlist{$:/_sq/Stories/StoriesList!!list}] -[]" select="0"> <>
<$reveal state="$:/config/LeftOpenTab/Style" type="match" text="leftopentab-title-word">
Right Column
<$set name="_otherStory" value=<> > <$set name="tv-story-list" filter="[enlist{$:/_sq/Stories/StoriesList!!list}] -[]" select="0"> <$set name="tv-history-list" filter="[enlist{$:/_sq/Stories/HistoriesList!!list}] -[]" select="0"> <$navigator story=<> history=<> > <>
<$transclude tiddler="$:/_sq/Stories/Templates/StoryToggleMenu"/>

$:/xp/LeftOpenTab/macros/title.title: $:/xp/LeftOpenTab/macros/title
$:/xp/LeftOpenTab/macros/title.text:
\define open-tiddler-list-title()
\whitespace trim
<$list filter="[{!!title}match{$:/temp/focussedTiddler}]" variable="ignore">
<$link to={{!!title}} class="xp-highlight-title"><$view field="title"/></$link>
</$list>
<$list filter="[{!!title}!match{$:/temp/focussedTiddler}]" variable="ignore">
<$link to={{!!title}}><$view field="title"/></$link>
</$list>
\end

$:/xp/LeftOpenTab/readme.title: $:/xp/LeftOpenTab/readme
$:/xp/LeftOpenTab/readme.text:
!! ~LeftOpenTab 左置开启选项卡

A button to put the [[Open|$:/core/ui/SideBar/Open]] tab to the left. Click the button again to restore to the default position.

!! Settings

{{$:/xp/LeftOpenTab/settings}}

!! Dependents

* $:/plugins/sq/Stories
* $:/plugins/felixhayashi/hotzone

!! See also

TWaddle's  [[LeftBar|http://leftbar.tiddlyspot.com/]] plugin

$:/xp/LeftOpenTab/settings.title: $:/xp/LeftOpenTab/settings
$:/xp/LeftOpenTab/settings.caption: ~LeftOpenTab Settings
$:/xp/LeftOpenTab/settings.text:
\define dropdown-leftopentab-title()
<$select tiddler="$:/config/LeftOpenTab/Style">
<option value="leftopentab-title-line">Line</option>
<option value="leftopentab-title-semicircle">Semi Circle</option>
<option value="leftopentab-title-square">Square</option>
<option value="leftopentab-title-word">Word</option>
</$select>
\end

\define dropdown-tiddler-title()
<$select tiddler="$:/xp/LeftOpenTab/macros/title">
<option value={{$:/xp/LeftOpenTab/text/default}}>Default</option>
<option value={{$:/xp/LeftOpenTab/text/highlight}}>Highlight</option>
<option value={{$:/xp/LeftOpenTab/text/underline}}>Underline</option>
</$select>
\end

\define dropdown-tiddler-title-color()
<$reveal state="$:/xp/LeftOpenTab/macros/title" type="match" text={{$:/xp/LeftOpenTab/text/highlight}}>
with
<$select tiddler="$:/config/LeftOpenTab/Color">
<option value="<<color tiddler-title-foreground>>">tiddler title foreground</option>
<option value="<<color primary>>">primary color</option>
</$select>
</$reveal>
\end


| ''Width'' of ~LeftSideBar|^<$edit-text tiddler="$:/xp/LeftOpenTab/metrics/width" tag="input" size=6/> <$button set="$:/xp/LeftOpenTab/metrics/width" setTo="256px" tooltip="Reset to default" aria-label="reset to default">Reset</$button> |
| ''padding-right'' of ~LeftSideBar|^<$edit-text tiddler="$:/xp/LeftOpenTab/metrics/paddingright" tag="input" size=6/> <$button set="$:/xp/LeftOpenTab/metrics/paddingright" setTo="14px" tooltip="Reset to default" aria-label="reset to default">Reset</$button> |
| ''padding-top'' of ~LeftSideBar|^<$edit-text tiddler="$:/xp/LeftOpenTab/metrics/paddingtop" tag="input" size=6/> <$button set="$:/xp/LeftOpenTab/metrics/paddingtop" setTo="56px" tooltip="Reset to default" aria-label="reset to default">Reset</$button> |
| ''Style'' of ~LeftSideBar|^<<dropdown-leftopentab-title>> |
| Show scrollbar|<$checkbox tiddler="$:/config/LeftOpenTab/Scrollbar" field="text" checked="inherit" unchecked="none" default="none"/> {{$:/config/LeftOpenTab/Scrollbar}} |
| Set [[storyleft default value|$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/storyleft]]|^<$edit-text tiddler="$:/xp/LeftOpenTab/metrics/storyleft" tag="input" size=6/> <$button set="$:/xp/LeftOpenTab/metrics/storyleft" setTo="0px" tooltip="Reset to default" aria-label="reset to default">Reset</$button> |
| Set [[storyright default value |$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/storyright]]|^<$edit-text tiddler="$:/xp/LeftOpenTab/metrics/storyright" tag="input" size=6/> <$button set="$:/xp/LeftOpenTab/metrics/storyright" setTo="770px" tooltip="Reset to default" aria-label="reset to default">Reset</$button> |

''Title'' of focussedTiddler: <<dropdown-tiddler-title>> <<dropdown-tiddler-title-color>>

$:/xp/LeftOpenTab/styles.title: $:/xp/LeftOpenTab/styles

$:/xp/LeftOpenTab/text/highlight.title: $:/xp/LeftOpenTab/text/highlight
$:/xp/LeftOpenTab/text/highlight.text:
\define open-tiddler-list-title()
\whitespace trim
<$list filter="[{!!title}match{$:/temp/focussedTiddler}]" variable="ignore">
<$link to={{!!title}} class="xp-highlight-title"><$view field="title"/></$link>
</$list>
<$list filter="[{!!title}!match{$:/temp/focussedTiddler}]" variable="ignore">
<$link to={{!!title}}><$view field="title"/></$link>
</$list>
\end

$:/xp/LeftOpenTab/text/underline.title: $:/xp/LeftOpenTab/text/underline
$:/xp/LeftOpenTab/text/underline.text:
\define open-tiddler-list-title()
\whitespace trim
<$list filter="[{!!title}match{$:/temp/focussedTiddler}]" variable="ignore">
<u><$link to={{!!title}}><$view field="title"/></$link></u>
</$list>
<$list filter="[{!!title}!match{$:/temp/focussedTiddler}]" variable="ignore">
<$link to={{!!title}}><$view field="title"/></$link>
</$list>
